foreignData.name: Hirnbrecher-Dämon
foreignData.text:
Fliegend, verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn der Hirnbrecher-Dämon ins Spiel kommt, lege die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof.
Delirium — Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments verlierst du 4 Lebenspunkte, es sei denn, dein Friedhof enthält vier oder mehr unterschiedliche Kartentypen.

foreignData.name: Demonio ruina mental
foreignData.text:
Vuela, arrolla.
Cuando el Demonio ruina mental entre al campo de batalla, pon las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.
Delirio — Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, pierdes 4 vidas a menos que entre las cartas de tu cementerio haya cuatro o más tipos de cartas.

foreignData.name: Démon de tourmental
foreignData.text:
Vol, piétinement
Quand le Démon de tourmental arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.
Délire — Au début de votre entretien, vous perdez 4 points de vie à moins qu'il n'y ait au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière.

foreignData.name: Demone Lacerasenno
foreignData.text:
Volare, travolgere
Quando il Demone Lacerasenno entra nel campo di battaglia, metti nel tuo cimitero le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio.
Delirio — All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, perdi 4 punti vita a meno che non ci siano quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.name: 精神壊しの悪魔
foreignData.text:
飛行、トランプル
精神壊しの悪魔が戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上から４枚のカードをあなたの墓地に置く。
昂揚 ― あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれるのでないかぎり、あなたは４点のライフを失う。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デーモン

foreignData.name: 정신파멸 악마
foreignData.text:
비행, 돌진
정신파멸 악마가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 네 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
섬망 — 당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 없다면, 당신은 생명 4점을 잃는다.

foreignData.name: Demônio Arruína-mente
foreignData.text:
Voar, atropelar
Quando Demônio Arruína-mente entrar no campo de batalha, coloque os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório em seu cemitério.
Delírio — No início de sua manutenção, você perde 4 pontos de vida a menos que haja quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério.

foreignData.name: Демон, Крушитель Разума
foreignData.text:
Полет, Пробивной удар
Когда Демон, Крушитель Разума выходит на поле битвы, положите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки на ваше кладбище.
Буйство — В начале вашего шага поддержки вы теряете 4 жизни, если только среди карт на вашем кладбище нет не менее четырех типов карт.

foreignData.name: 窥心恶魔
foreignData.text:
飞行，践踏
当窥心恶魔进战场时，将你牌库顶的四张牌置入你的坟墓场。
躁狂～在你的维持开始时，除非你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，否则你失去4点生命。

foreignData.name: 窺心惡魔
foreignData.text:
飛行，踐踏
當窺心惡魔進戰場時，將你牌庫頂的四張牌置入你的墳墓場。
躁狂～在你的維持開始時，除非你墳墓場中牌的類別有四種或更多，否則你失去4點生命。

name: Mindwrack Demon
originalText:
Flying, trample
When Mindwrack Demon enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.
Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 4 life unless there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Mindwrack Demon’s delirium triggered ability does not include an intervening “if” clause. This ability triggers at the beginning of your upkeep regardless of the number of types in your graveyard, and it checks that number as it resolves to determine whether you lose 4 life or not.

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

text:
Flying, trample
When Mindwrack Demon enters the battlefield, mill four cards.
Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 4 life unless there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
